mockGoogleMapsData.description: Family-owned Mediterranean restaurant serving authentic Greek and Lebanese cuisine since 2018

recentReviews.text: Amazing food and atmosphere! The staff was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable about the menu. The lamb was cooked to perfection.
Food was decent but we had to wait 25 minutes just to place our order. Called ahead but they said they don't take phone orders during dinner rush. Very frustrating.
Great authentic Mediterranean food! Parking can be tricky on Lincoln Road but worth it. The hummus and falafel were excellent.
Tried calling three times during lunch to ask about vegan options - no one answered. Finally went in person and found out they have several vegan dishes. Why not answer the phone?
Hidden gem on Lincoln Road! The owner Sophia personally came to our table to check on us. Authentic Greek flavors and generous portions.
Food is good but service can be slow during tourist season. Had to flag down our server multiple times. Lincoln Road gets so busy in winter.
Excellent Greek food! Only complaint is they don't seem to have online ordering which would be convenient for takeout.
Called during happy hour to ask about reservations - phone rang and rang. Eventually gave up and went somewhere else. Lost a customer.

userSearchQuery.originalMessage: mediterranean restaurants Miami Beach for digital marketing
userSearchQuery.serviceDescription: comprehensive digital marketing services including SEO, social media management, and online advertising to grow your business
